channel.title: RSCDaemon client (very old one)
channel.description:
Hey!
I have very old rscdaemon client. There are flashing background, like real rsc client etc.
Download link: http://www.upload.ee/files/728882/RSCDaemon_client.rar.html
This client works well, but is it possible to make this client allowed to connect RSCAngel source server or any RSCDv25 source etc? player.java etc need to be changed etc.
EDIT: Ohh soz, my bad, please move it to runescape classic client help.

item.title: RSCDaemon client (very old one)
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

Server and frontend for this:
http://jamili.da3rx.com/rscd/RSCD.rar
http://jamili.da3rx.com/rscd/frontend.rar

Read full topic

item.title: RSCDaemon client (very old one)
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

[quote=“ip0wns, post:3, topic:353481”][quote author=sw0o0sh link=topic=449799.msg3300220#msg3300220 date=1281242882]
And what exactly is the point of this? To have a flashing background like the real RSC?
[/quote]
Flashing background will b great.
But I like the loading screen and its loading much faster than other clients.

:)[/quote]

Yeah, I think there’s a few tutorials around on the animated backgrounds, I can kinda remember reading one but I’m not 100%. As for your request I think changing this client to port to new servers would be redundant, perhaps you could look into simply modifying the background on the current client to fit this theme. The loading part should be easy with a tutorial or two, however I’m not sure about the animated login.

Read full topic
